ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges

Class BadgeNewYears

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team06.badges.BadgeNewYears
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BadgeNewYears
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The New Years badge is earned when the user is active on New Years day(Jan 1st). Also used to check whether the user has earned the badge by accessing their lifetime totals.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team06
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • checkBadge

        public boolean checkBadge()
        Tests if the user has been active on New Years Day (Jan 1st). If yes, then the Mordor badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        flag true if badge achieved, otherwise false

      • getPercent

        public double getPercent()
        Returns the percent representaion of how much of the badge has been earned.
        Returns:
        percent double value of the percent until completion of the badge

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description of the badge so the user knows what they must do in order to earn the badge.
        Returns:
        description String of the description
